title: Powerful Beard #1
description: Look upon me mortals, as I harnass the power of THE BEARD

title: Powerful Beard #2
description: My ALL POWERFUL BEARD can even turn my surroundings into stone, if I so wish.

title: Powerful Beard #3
description: My BEARD can even make entire trains STOP IN THEIR TRACKS

title: Powerful Beard #4
description: BEHOLD, I can even transport my beard inside of monitors

title: Powerful Beard #5
description: My beard is SO mighty, that even cameras are forced to zoom in

title: Powerful Beard #6
description: YOU DIDN'T EVEN NOTICE I HAVE ON PINK SLIPPERS BECAUSE OF MY BEARD

title: Powerful Beard #7
description: My beard even makes Ryan Gosling timid

title: Powerful Beard #8
description: My beard is even capable of making my body change clothes in an instant

title: Powerful Beard #9
description: Yes, you see this correctly. Trees and mountains bend to the will of the Beard

title: Powerful-Beard #10
description: The Beard in all its natural wonder
